MS MCQs

    Manage clienteling in Dynamics 365 Commerce

    »

    1. Which of the following options best describes clienteling?

      Clienteling provides assisted selling capabilities in the stores, such as refining, product comparison, and item availability.

      Clienteling can’t be used in Commerce Headquarters.

      Clienteling is a feature in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, and cannot be used without integration between Commerce and Customer Insights.


    2. Which of the following options shows a collection of contact information for each customer, including three additional properties that are defined in Commerce Headquarters?

      Client Book

      Activities

      Notes
